column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=And you feel it would be a mistake for Israel to act unilaterally , or not ?
#Text=Yes .
#Text=I do n’t think Israel should say it ; I do n’t think Israel should talk about it .
#Text=The minute we shall talk about it we shall be left alone .
#Text=Israel is the only country that has never had a foreign army to defend it .
#Text=All the European countries had foreign armies , most of the Asian countries .
#Text=We do n’t .
#Text=And …
#Text=You do n’t feel America plays that role with Israel ?
#Text=America helps us a great deal .
#Text=We are grateful .
#Text=But we have never asked for American soldiers to defend Israel .
#Text=And one of the popularities of Israel in the United States is that American mothers know that their children do n’t face danger here .
#Text=Although they face it quite often in Iraq and Afghanistan .
#Text=But here we defend it ourselves .
#Text=Even in the early times when the United States recognized us , they did n’t give us rifles to defend our lives .
#Text=It ’s only later that they gave us arms and we are very grateful .
#Text=But with Iran , we shall do what we have to do in our own way .
#Text=We do n’t want to bother anybody because it ’s a world problem .
#Text=Until now , the problem was will the world stand on the side of Israel .
#Text=Today , the question is will the world stand on the side of the world ?
#Text=Iran is a world danger .
#Text=The 2006 Lebanon War
#Text=' The Iron Dome ' : The Anti- Kassam rocket system , to be built by Israeli defense experts RAFAEL , is slated to be able to take its first battery in 2012 .

#Text=The missile shield is designed to prevent the problems encountered in Haifa during the war , when the city , including its oil refinery , came under heavy shelling from Hezbollah in Lebanon , just on the other side of the mountains ( photo , above ) .
#Text=The Dome is not without its questions and controversies , including whether the $ 207 million ( £104 million ) system will work .
#Text=Image : David Shankbone .
#Text=How did the Lebanese War help Israel ’s security ?
#Text=Look , Israel is almost 60 years old next year .
#Text=In the 60 years we went through seven wars , two intifadas , all of them outgunned , outmanned , outnumbered .
#Text=We did n’t lose a single one .
#Text=So there were wars that were more successful , less successful , never a failure .
#Text=Now about Lebanon , it became a question of did we do rightly or wrongly .
#Text=But clearly it not wind up better for Hamas , not better for Hezbollah winning .
#Text=They do n’t know to answer , “ Why did they go to the war ? ”
#Text=Today , everybody recognizes that Hezbollah is a danger to Lebanon more than to Israel .
#Text=Today when you speak to a Frenchman or to the United States , they are worried more about Lebanon and Hezbollah than about Hezbollah and Israel .
#Text=So , we have learned our lessons too , and but I think by and large , some people say we could have saved the lives of 30 soldiers .
#Text=Maybe .
